title: "Troll" players in normal games with blank matches history?
body:
Just wonder where these accounts are come from? These players are normally "troll" in game and has a blank matches history. When I tried to communicate with them in game, they don't talk at all. Some times there are even up to 3 pre-made players with blank matches history. The feature of these players are: 1. Most of them only play normal games. 2. Act as "troll" or "dumb" players in game. 3. They rarely talk in game. 4. Blank matches history. 5. All level 30 with some runes.
Every time I met these players in normal games. It make me doubt if these accounts come from somewhere like "gray market" or if they were "hacked accounts" that from "account laundering" (with similar concept of money laundering).

replies.body: I've only played one game where i was certain there was a bit.  They are rare but they exist.
They are boting maybe. Basically a bot playing for them in their account to get it to level 30 or just to save up ip I guess.
